name: Tank Dungeon Prototype
description:
TANK DUNGEON
ONE BUTTON PROTOTYPE

 
 One button dungeon crawler game, the player can move and shoot with one button to kill enemies and progress through levels. The player character keeps turning clockwise, time the one button to move to the desired direction.

Pillars

One button to move and shoot.

Enemies with same movement

Dungeon Puzzles Levels.

Hook

Shoot to kill and move, the projectile decides where the player moves to.

3 Cs

Character

The main protagonist is a basic 2D sprite with one side pointed out so the player knows which direction is forward, the player can move and shoot with one button, the character can move to a new position by
shooting, the character translates to where the projectile stops.

Camera

Top down which follows the player around.

Controls

Left mouse Click to move and shoot
